name: guard-dog
effect: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.
short_effect: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.
flavor_text: Boosts the Pokémon’s Attack stat if intimidated. Moves and items that would force the Pokémon to switch out also fail to work.
